body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Virtual Tour     Dog Mushing the Yukon River                Dog Mushing the Yukon River       Travel by dog team has been the standard means of transportation in the remote Yukon River region for ages. Follow along on a 13 day, 300 mile winter dog mushing adventure on the Yukon & Charley Rivers. 'Six years of flying, floating, hiking, & working this land does not  collectively compare to one experience mushing through it.' -Josh Spice As written in the Slaven's Roadhouse log book, 3/31/2014  VIEW IN FULL SCREEN   Â   View full screen.
title: Yukon - Charley Rivers National Preserve: Dog Mushing the Yukon River
